              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is locally supported. More precisely, the support
<Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{supp}{\Phi}_{z}{:=}\overline{\{x\in\Omega\mid{\Phi}_{z}\neq 0\}}" text="supp@(Phi _ z) assign overline@(conditional-set@(x element-of Omega, Phi _ z not-equals 0))" xml:id="S2.p10.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">supp</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m7.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m7.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, which
corresponds to the domain of influence of the degree of freedom
<Math mode="inline" tex="V\mapsto V(z)" text="V maps-to V * z" xml:id="S2.p10.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m8.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p10.m8.1">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, verifies
<!--  %**** String Line 375 **** --></p>
      <equation xml:id="S2.Ex10">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\operatorname{supp}{\Phi}_{z}=\omega_{z}\ {:=}\bigcup_{{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}:{K}%&#10;\ni z}{K}." text="supp@(Phi _ z) = omega _ z assign (union _ (K element-of M colon K contains z))@(K)" xml:id="S2.Ex10.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S2.Ex10.m1.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex10.m1.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">supp</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp rpadding="5.0pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="display" meaning="union" name="bigcup" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">⋃</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="contains" name="ni" role="RELOP">∋</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>It is useful to determine the scaling behavior of norms of the Lagrange basis
functions. To this end, we associate nodes of a given element <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}" text="K element-of M" xml:id="S2.p10.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
to the ones of the reference simplex <Math mode="inline" tex="{{{K}_{d}}}=\operatorname{Conv}\{0,e_{1},\dots,e_{d}\}" text="K _ d = Conv@(0, e _ 1, dots, e _ d)" xml:id="S2.p10.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m10.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m10.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m10.4"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m10.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m10.5"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.p10.m10.1">Conv</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.p10.m10.2">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m10.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S2.p10.m10.3">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m10.5">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbb{R}}^{d}}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S2.p10.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in the following manner. Given <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K})" text="z element-of L _ ell * K" xml:id="S2.p10.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m12.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p10.m12.1">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, write
<Math mode="inline" tex="z=\sum_{i=0}^{d}\lambda_{i}a_{i}" text="z = ((sum _ (i = 0)) ^ d)@(lambda _ i * a _ i)" xml:id="S2.p10.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> as a convex combination of the vertices of
<Math mode="inline" tex="{K}" text="K" xml:id="S2.p10.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, rearrange the coefficients in decreasing order such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda_{0}^{*}\geq\dots\geq\lambda_{d}^{*}" text="(lambda _ 0) ^ * &gt;= dots &gt;= (lambda _ d) ^ *" xml:id="S2.p10.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and set</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:RefNode" xml:id="S2.E6">
        <tags>
          <tag>(2.6)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">2.6</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="\hat{z}{:=}\sum_{i=1}^{d}\lambda_{i}^{*}e_{i}\in{L_{{\ell}}}({{{K}_{d}}})." text="hat@(z) assign ((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ d)@((lambda _ i) ^ * * e _ i) element-of L _ ell * K _ d" xml:id="S2.E6.m1">

      <p>Notice that, although the rearrangement may be not unique, <Math mode="inline" tex="\hat{z}" text="hat@(z)" xml:id="S2.p10.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="hat" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">^</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is
well-defined and does not depend on the enumeration of the vertices of <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}" text="K" xml:id="S2.p10.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
Fixed one node <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K})" text="z element-of L _ ell * K" xml:id="S2.p10.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m18.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p10.m18.1">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, there exists a (not necessarily
unique) affine mapping <Math mode="inline" tex="A:{{\mathbb{R}}^{d}}\to{{\mathbb{R}}^{d}}" text="A colon R ^ d to R ^ d" xml:id="S2.p10.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="A({{{K}_{d}}})={K}" text="A * K _ d = K" xml:id="S2.p10.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m20.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m20.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="A(\hat{z})=z" text="A * hat@(z) = z" xml:id="S2.p10.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m21.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m21.1">
                      <XMTok name="hat" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Hence the transformation rule and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\left|{{{K}_{d}}}\right|}=1/d!" text="absolute-value@(K _ d) = 1 / dfactorial" xml:id="S2.p10.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m22.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m22.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="factorial" role="POSTFIX">!</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> leads to
<!--  %**** String Line 400 **** --></p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:LebnormBFct2" xml:id="S2.E7">
        <tags>
          <tag>(2.7)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">2.7</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="{{\left\|{{{\Phi}_{z}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{K}}}}}=\sqrt{d!}{\left|{K}\right|}^{%&#10;\frac{1}{2}}{{\left\|{{\hat{\Phi}_{\hat{z}}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{{{K}_{d}}}}}}}" text="(norm@(Phi _ z)) _ (list@(0, 2, K)) = square-root@(dfactorial) * (absolute-value@(K)) ^ (1 / 2) * (norm@((hat@(Phi)) _ (hat@(z)))) _ (list@(0, 2, K _ d))" xml:id="S2.E7.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.E7.m1.8"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">∥</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.E7.m1.8">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>
                      <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">∥</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.E7.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.E7.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.E7.m1.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.E7.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.E7.m1.2">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E7.m1.3">K</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="square-root"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="factorial" role="POSTFIX">!</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.E7.m1.7"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E7.m1.7">K</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="script" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.E7.m1.9"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">∥</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.E7.m1.9">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="hat" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="hat" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">∥</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.E7.m1.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.E7.m1.5"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.E7.m1.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.E7.m1.4">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.E7.m1.5">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.E7.m1.6">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="{\left|{K}\right|}" text="absolute-value@(K)" xml:id="S2.p10.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>

              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the <Math mode="inline" tex="d" text="d" xml:id="S2.p10.m24">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-dimensional Lebesgue measure of <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}" text="K" xml:id="S2.p10.m25">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\hat{\Phi}_{\hat{z}}\in{\mathcal{P}_{{\ell}}({{{{K}_{d}}}})}" text="(hat@(Phi)) _ (hat@(z)) element-of P _ ell * K _ d" xml:id="S2.p10.m26">

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the polynomial that is 1
at <Math mode="inline" tex="\hat{z}" text="hat@(z)" xml:id="S2.p10.m27">
          <XMath>

        </Math> and vanishes at the other Lagrange nodes

    </para>
    <para xml:id="S2.p11">
      <p>Furthermore, it is useful to extend the linear functionals</p>

      <p>to functions in <Math mode="inline" tex="{H^{{1}}}(\Omega)" text="H ^ 1 * Omega" xml:id="S2.p11.m1">

functionals are the basis of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{P}_{{\ell}}({{F}})}^{\prime}" text="P _ ell * F ^ prime" xml:id="S2.p11.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m13.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p11.m13.1">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> that is dual to
<Math mode="inline" tex="\{{\Phi}_{z}{}_{|{F}}\}_{z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({F})}" xml:id="S2.p11.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                    <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m14.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

          </XMath>
        </Math>, this amounts to
defining <Math mode="inline" tex="\{{\Psi}_{z}^{F}\}_{z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({F})}" text="(set@((Psi _ z) ^ F)) _ (z element-of L _ ell * F)" xml:id="S2.p11.m15">

      <p>In order to state the counterpart of (<ref labelref="LABEL:LebnormBFct2"/>), use
(<ref labelref="LABEL:RefNode"/>) to associate a given node
<Math mode="inline" tex="z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({F})" text="z element-of L _ ell * F" xml:id="S2.p11.m16">

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>

        </Math> of some face <Math mode="inline" tex="{F}\in{\mathcal{F}_{d-1}}({\mathcal{M}})" text="F element-of F _ (d - 1) * M" xml:id="S2.p11.m17">
          <XMath>

a node of the reference simplex <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}_{d-1}" text="K _ (d - 1)" xml:id="S2.p11.m18">

identifying <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d-1}" text="R ^ (d - 1)" xml:id="S2.p11.m20">

              <XMApp>

          </XMath>
        </Math>, this
gives the same point as applying (<ref labelref="LABEL:RefNode"/>) for some element
<Math mode="inline" tex="{K}" text="K" xml:id="S2.p11.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>

          <XMath>

          </XMath>
        </Math>. Again the transformation rule leads to</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:LebnormDBFct2" xml:id="S2.E10">
        <tags>

        <Math mode="display" tex="{{\left\|{{{\Psi}_{z}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{F}}}}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{(d-1)!}}{\left|{F%&#10;}\right|}^{-\frac{1}{2}}{{\left\|{{\hat{\Psi}_{\hat{z}}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{{K}_{%&#10;d-1}}}}}}," text="(norm@(Psi _ z)) _ (list@(0, 2, F)) = (1 / square-root@((d - 1)factorial)) * (absolute-value@(F)) ^ (- 1 / 2) * (norm@((hat@(Psi)) _ (hat@(z)))) _ (list@(0, 2, K _ (d - 1)))" xml:id="S2.E10.m1">

          <XMath>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m35.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p11.m35.1">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of
<Math mode="inline" tex="{S}^{{\ell},0}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S ^ (list@(ell, 0)) * M" xml:id="S2.p11.m36">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m36.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m36.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p11.m36.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.p11.m36.2">0</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m36.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p11.m36.3">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, any <Math mode="inline" tex="{N}_{z;{F}}" text="N _ (list@(z, F))" xml:id="S2.p11.m37">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m37.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m37.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p11.m37.1">z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p11.m37.2">F</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="{F}\ni z" text="F contains z" xml:id="S2.p11.m38">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="contains" name="ni" role="RELOP">∋</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> extends the linear functional (<ref labelref="LABEL:PointEVal"/>) to
<Math mode="inline" tex="{H^{{1}}}(\Omega)" text="H ^ 1 * Omega" xml:id="S2.p11.m39">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m39.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p11.m39.1">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Finally, we note that if <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in\partial\Omega" text="z element-of partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="S2.p11.m40">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
then the implication</p>
      <equation xml:id="S2.Ex13">
        <Math mode="display" tex="v\in{H^{{1}}}_{0}(\Omega)\implies N_{z;F}(v)=0" text="v element-of (H ^ 1) _ 0 * Omega implies N _ (list@(z, F)) * v = 0" xml:id="S2.Ex13.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Ex13.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex13.m1.3">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="implies" role="ARROW">⟹</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.Ex13.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.Ex13.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex13.m1.1">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex13.m1.2">F</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Ex13.m1.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex13.m1.4">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>is ensured whenever there hold <Math mode="inline" tex="F\ni z" text="F contains z" xml:id="S2.p11.m41">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="contains" name="ni" role="RELOP">∋</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="F\subset\partial\Omega" text="F subset-of partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="S2.p11.m42">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a
boundary face.</p>
    </para>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:S:ConformityImpact" xml:id="S3">
    <tags>
      <tag>3</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§3</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">3</tag>Conformity and approximation error</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">3</tag>Conformity and approximation error</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S3.p1">
      <p>Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:P:conforming"/> determines conditions that characterize when
piecewise polynomial functions are conforming. The main goal of this section is
to analyse the impact of these conditions on the error when approximating the
gradient of a function.</p>
    </para>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:S:best-errors" xml:id="S3.SS1">
      <tags>
        <tag>3.1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§3.1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=". ">3.1</tag>Global and local best errors</title>
      <toctitle><tag close=" ">3.1</tag>Global and local best errors</toctitle>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS1.p1">
        <p>We first provide a notion that measures the possible downgrading resulting from
conformity. In order to take into account boundary conditions, we consider the
following setting for the space <Math mode="inline" tex="X" text="X" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of target functions and the approximants
<!--  %**** String Line 500 **** --><Math mode="inline" tex="{S}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>

                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>

            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="X" text="X" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m4">

            <XMath>

        <equation labels="LABEL:H1seminorm" xml:id="S3.E1">
          <tags>

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>is definite on <Math mode="inline" tex="X-{S}({\mathcal{M}})" text="X - S * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The setting <Math mode="inline" tex="X={H^{1}}_{0}(\Omega)" text="X = (H ^ 1) _ 0 * Omega" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p1.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m11.1">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="{S}({\mathcal{M}})={S}^{{\ell},0}_{0}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S * M = (S ^ (list@(ell, 0))) _ 0 * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p1.m12.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m12.3">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p1.m12.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p1.m12.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m12.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m12.2">0</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p1.m12.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p1.m12.4">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in the introduction
§<ref labelref="LABEL:S:Intro"/> is an example.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS1.p2">
        <p>The best (possible) error of approximating <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in X" text="v element-of X" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is then given by</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex1">
          <Math mode="display" tex="E(v,{\mathcal{M}}){:=}E\big{(}v,{S}({\mathcal{M}})\big{)}{:=}\inf_{V\in{S}({%&#10;\mathcal{M}})}{\left|{v-V}\right|_{{\Omega}}}" text="E * open-interval@(v, M) assign E * open-interval@(v, S * M) assign (infimum _ (V element-of S * M))@((absolute-value@(v - V)) _ Omega)" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.2">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.3">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.4"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.4">M</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">inf</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.1">M</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.7"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.7">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and <Math mode="inline" tex="E(v,{\mathcal{M}})=0" text="E * open-interval@(v, M) = 0" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p2.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p2.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m2.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m2.2">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in{S}({\mathcal{M}})" text="v element-of S * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p2.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m3.1">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thanks to, e.g., the
Projection Theorem in Hilbert spaces, there exists a unique best
<!--  %**** String Line 525 **** -->approximation <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{\mathcal{M}}" text="V _ M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex2">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\left|{v-V_{\mathcal{M}}}\right|_{{\Omega}}}=E(v,{\mathcal{M}})." text="(absolute-value@(v - V _ M)) _ Omega = E * open-interval@(v, M)" xml:id="S3.Ex2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex2.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex2.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex2.m1.3.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex2.m1.3.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex2.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex2.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex2.m1.1">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex2.m1.2">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="S({\mathcal{M}})" text="S * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p2.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m5.1">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a linear space, this is equivalent to</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex3">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\forall W\in{S}({\mathcal{M}})\quad\int_{\Omega}{\nabla}V_{\mathcal{M}}\cdot{%&#10;\nabla}W=\int_{\Omega}{\nabla}v\cdot{\nabla}W." text="formulae@(for-all@(W) element-of S * M, (integral _ Omega)@(nabla@(V _ M) cdot nabla@(W)) = (integral _ Omega)@(nabla@(v) cdot nabla@(W)))" xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.2">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.2.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="for-all" name="forall" role="BIGOP">∀</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.1">M</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.2.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{\mathcal{M}}" text="V _ M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is called the Ritz projection of <Math mode="inline" tex="v" text="v" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> onto <Math mode="inline" tex="{S}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p2.m8.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p2.m8.1">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS1.p3">
        <p>Similarly, on each single element <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}" text="K element-of M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the best error is
given by</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex4">
          <Math mode="display" tex="e(v,{K}){:=}e\big{(}v,{\mathcal{P}_{{\ell}}({{K}})}\big{)}{:=}\inf_{P\in{%&#10;\mathcal{P}_{{\ell}}({{K}})}}{\left|{v-P}\right|_{K}}," text="e * open-interval@(v, K) assign e * open-interval@(v, P _ ell * K) assign (infimum _ (P element-of P _ ell * K))@((absolute-value@(v - P)) _ K)" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.3"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.2">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.3">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.5"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.6.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.5">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.6.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.4"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

<!--  %**** String Line 575 **** -->      <para xml:id="S3.SS1.p4">
        <p>Since the local best errors cannot be overtaken by any global approximation,
one may expect that an appropriate ‘sum’ of them provides a lower bound for
corresponding global best errors. In fact, if <Math mode="inline" tex="{S}^{\prime}" text="S ^ prime" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is any subspace of
<Math mode="inline" tex="{S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p4.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p4.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m2.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m2.2">
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p4.m2.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m2.3">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, one readily verifies</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx2">
          <equation labels="LABEL:local&lt;=global" xml:id="S3.E4">

            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle\left[\sum_{{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}}e(v,{K})^{2}\right]^{\frac{1}{2}}%&#10;\leq E(v,{S}^{\prime})," text="(delimited-[]@((sum _ (K element-of M))@(e * (open-interval@(v, K)) ^ 2))) ^ (1 / 2) less= E * open-interval@(v, S ^ prime)" xml:id="S3.E4.m2">

                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="script" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m2.3"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m2.4.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.E4.m2.4.2">

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\left[\sum_{{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}}e(v,{K})^{2}\right]^{\frac{1}{2}}%&#10;\leq E(v,{S}^{\prime})," text="(delimited-[]@((sum _ (K element-of M))@(e * (open-interval@(v, K)) ^ 2))) ^ (1 / 2) less= E * open-interval@(v, S ^ prime)" xml:id="S3.E4.m1">

          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>interpreting the right-hand side in a broken manner if necessary. Notice that
there holds equality for <Math mode="inline" tex="{S}^{\prime}={S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S ^ prime = S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m3">

              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>

                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m3.1">ℓ</XMTok>

                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m3.2">

                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, while for
<Math mode="inline" tex="{S}^{\prime}={S}({\mathcal{M}})\subset{S}^{{\ell},0}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S ^ prime = S * M subset-of S ^ (list@(ell, 0)) * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p4.m4.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m4.3">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p4.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p4.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m4.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m4.2">0</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p4.m4.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m4.4">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the question arises
if the requirement of continuity entails some downgrading of the approximation
quality: the local approximants <Math mode="inline" tex="P_{K}" text="P _ K" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}" text="K element-of M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, on the left-hand side
are decoupled, while their counterparts <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{\mathcal{M}}{}_{|{K}}" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUBSCRIPT" scriptpos="2">
                <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                </XMArg>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}" text="K element-of M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p4.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, on
the right-hand side are coupled and so constrained.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS1.p5">
        <p>In order to measure the possible downgrading, consider the inequality opposite
to (<ref labelref="LABEL:local&lt;=global"/>) and denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="{\delta}({\mathcal{M}})" text="delta * M" xml:id="S3.SS1.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.SS1.p5.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS1.p5.m1.1">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the smallest constant
<Math mode="inline" tex="C" text="C" xml:id="S3.SS1.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:global&lt;=Clocal" xml:id="S3.E5">
          <tags>
            <tag>(3.5)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">3.5</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\forall v\in X\quad E\big{(}v,{S}({\mathcal{M}})\big{)}\leq C\left[\sum_{{K}%&#10;\in{\mathcal{M}}}e(v,{K})^{2}\right]^{\frac{1}{2}}" text="formulae@(for-all@(v) element-of X, E * open-interval@(v, S * M) less= C * (delimited-[]@((sum _ (K element-of M))@(e * (open-interval@(v, K)) ^ 2))) ^ (1 / 2))" xml:id="S3.E5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.E5.m1.5"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.E5.m1.6"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.E5.m1.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>

                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.E5.m1.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.E5.m1.2"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.E5.m1.6.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.E5.m1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
