        </itemize>
        <p>This property holds for stars of interior nodes <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in\Omega" text="z element-of Omega" xml:id="S3.SS2.p3.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The case of a
boundary node <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in\partial\Omega" text="z element-of partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="S3.SS2.p3.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is more subtle. It holds whenever the
boundary is a Lipschitz graph in a sufficiently big neighborhood of <Math mode="inline" tex="z" text="z" xml:id="S3.SS2.p3.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Noteworthy, the latter property is not necessary; see, e.g., the slit domain
and Figure <ref labelref="LABEL:F:edge-connectedness"/> (left). Roughly speaking, it will be
<!--  %**** String Line 825 **** -->verified also in similar cases where the boundary can be accessed from both
sides if that part is at least <Math mode="inline" tex="(d-1)" text="d - 1" xml:id="S3.SS2.p3.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.SS2.p3.m15.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS2.p3.m15.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-dimensional, otherwise it will not hold.
Figure <ref labelref="LABEL:F:edge-connectedness"/> (right) illustrates such a counterexample
for <Math mode="inline" tex="d=2" text="d = 2" xml:id="S3.SS2.p3.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <figure inlist="lof" labels="LABEL:F:edge-connectedness" placement="h" xml:id="S3.F1">
        <tags>
          <tag>Figure 1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Figure 1</tag>
        </tags>
        <graphics class="ltx_centering" graphic="Connected.eps" options="bb=176 37 650 505, width=187.902pt, height=86.0pt" xml:id="S3.F1.g1"/>
        <graphics class="ltx_centering" graphic="NotConnected.eps" options="bb=176 37 650 505, width=187.902pt, height=86.0pt" xml:id="S3.F1.g2"/>
        <toccaption class="ltx_centering"><tag close=" ">1</tag>Edge-connectedness: two-dimensional stars (grey areas) at the
boundary (thick lines), the left one is edge-connected, the right one is not.</toccaption>
        <caption class="ltx_centering"><tag close=". ">Figure 1</tag>Edge-connectedness: two-dimensional stars (grey areas) at the
boundary (thick lines), the left one is edge-connected, the right one is not.</caption>
      </figure>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS2.p4">
        <p>It is worth noting that, if a star is not <Math mode="inline" tex="(d-1)" text="d - 1" xml:id="S3.SS2.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.SS2.p4.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS2.p4.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-face-connected, the <Math mode="inline" tex="H^{1}" text="H ^ 1" xml:id="S3.SS2.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-norm
is not strong enough to couple both sides across their common part of the
boundary, suggesting that also corresponding elements should not be coupled in
the finite element space.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:S:ldecoupling" xml:id="S3.SS3">

                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. The constant
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\delta}_{K}" text="delta _ K" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> depends on <Math mode="inline" tex="d" text="d" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\ell" text="ell" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, and the elements in <Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{K}" text="omega _ K" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m12">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="S3.SS3.p2">
          <p>We start by recalling the definition (<ref labelref="LABEL:Pelm"/>) of the best approximation
<Math mode="inline" tex="P_{K}" text="P _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and exploit the orthogonality (<ref labelref="LABEL:Pelm:ort"/>) to write</p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex17">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\left|{v-{\Pi}v}\right|_{K}}^{2}=e(v,{K})^{2}+{\left|{P_{K}-{\Pi}v}\right|_{K%&#10;}}^{2}," text="((absolute-value@(v - Pi * v)) _ K) ^ 2 = e * (open-interval@(v, K)) ^ 2 + ((absolute-value@(P _ K - Pi * v)) _ K) ^ 2" xml:id="S3.Ex17.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex17.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex17.m1.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex17.m1.3.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex17.m1.3.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex17.m1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex17.m1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex17.m1.1">v</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex17.m1.2">K</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex17.m1.3.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex17.m1.3.2">
                                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>where the second square on the right hand side measures the deviation of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\Pi}v" text="Pi * v" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of being locally optimal. Thanks to (<ref labelref="LABEL:DefIp:unconstrained"/>), there holds</p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex18">
            <Math mode="display" tex="(P_{K}-{\Pi}v)_{|{K}}=\sum_{z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K})}\big{[}P_{K}(z)-{\Pi}_{z}v%&#10;\big{]}{\Phi}_{z}{}_{|{K}}=\sum_{z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K})\cap{\mathcal{C}}}\big{[%&#10;}P_{K}(z)-{N}_{z,{F}_{z}}(v)\big{]}{\Phi}_{z}{}_{|{K}}," xml:id="S3.Ex18.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  </XMArg>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex18.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex18.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex18.m1.5">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="pre3"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  </XMArg>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex18.m1.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex18.m1.2">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex18.m1.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex18.m1.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex18.m1.3">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex18.m1.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="pre3"/>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  </XMArg>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>which reveals that this deviation is entirely related to the requirements for
conformity. To bound it, we first apply the triangle inequality to obtain</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:CplngErr" xml:id="S3.E10">
            <tags>
              <tag>(3.10)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">3.10</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\left|{P_{K}-{\Pi}v}\right|_{K}}\leq\sum_{z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K})\cap{\mathcal{%&#10;C}}}\big{|}P_{K}(z)-{N}_{z,{F}_{z}}(v)\big{|}{{\left\|{{{\nabla}{\Phi}_{z}}}%&#10;\right\|_{{0,2;{K}}}}}." text="(absolute-value@(P _ K - Pi * v)) _ K less= (sum _ (z element-of L _ ell * K intersection C))@(absolute-value@(P _ K * z - N _ (list@(z, F _ z)) * v) * (norm@(nabla@(Phi _ z))) _ (list@(0, 2, K)))" xml:id="S3.E10.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.9"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.E10.m1.9">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.9.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.E10.m1.9.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E10.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.9.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.E10.m1.9.2">
                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.7"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E10.m1.7">z</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.2"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.3"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E10.m1.2">z</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.E10.m1.3">
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.8"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E10.m1.8">v</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.9.3"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">∥</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.E10.m1.9.3">
                                  <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                    <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">∥</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.4"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.5"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.E10.m1.6"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.E10.m1.4">0</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.E10.m1.5">2</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E10.m1.6">K</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>We proceed by bounding each term of the sum separately. To this end,
fix any <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K})\cap{\mathcal{C}}" text="z element-of L _ ell * K intersection C" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p2.m3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m3.1">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and, using that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{z}" text="omega _ z" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="(d-1)" text="d - 1" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p2.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m5.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-face-connected, choose a corresponding sequence
<Math mode="inline" tex="({K}_{i})_{i=0}^{n}" text="(K _ i _ (i = 0)) ^ n" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p2.m6.1"/>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of elements connecting <Math mode="inline" tex="{F}_{z}" text="F _ z" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m7">

              </XMath>
            </Math>. Set

              </XMath>
            </Math>. For the sake of readibility, we sometimes replace

              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMath>

                  </XMWrap>

              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>which, by telescopic expansion, leads to</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:Telescopic" xml:id="S3.E11">
            <tags>
              <tag>(3.11)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">3.11</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="P_{K}(z)-{N}_{z,{F}_{z}}(v)={N}_{z,0}(P_{0}-v)+\sum_{i=1}^{n}{N}_{z,i}(P_{i}-P%&#10;_{i-1})." text="P _ K * z - N _ (list@(z, F _ z)) * v = N _ (list@(z, 0)) * (P _ 0 - v) + ((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ n)@(N _ (list@(z, i)) * (P _ i - P _ (i - 1)))" xml:id="S3.E11.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.E11.m1.9"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.E11.m1.9">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

          </equation>
          <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="{F}_{0}\subset{K}_{0}" text="F _ 0 subset-of K _ 0" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m15">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\int_{{K}_{0}}(v-P_{0})=0" text="(integral _ K _ 0)@(v - P _ 0) = 0" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m16">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p2.m16.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m16.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, one can
combine (<ref labelref="LABEL:LebnormDBFct2"/>) and Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:L:TraceAndError"/> to
derive</p>

                  <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=\left|\int_{{F}_{0}}(v-P_{0}){\Psi}^{i}_{z}\right|\leq{{\left\|{%&#10;{v-P_{0}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{{F}_{0}}}}}}{{\left\|{{{\Psi}^{0}_{z}}}\right\|_{{0,%&#10;2;{{F}_{0}}}}}}" text="absent = absolute-value@((integral _ F _ 0)@((v - P _ 0) * (Psi ^ i) _ z)) less= (norm@(v - P _ 0)) _ (list@(0, 2, F _ 0)) * (norm@((Psi ^ 0) _ z)) _ (list@(0, 2, F _ 0))" xml:id="S3.Ex21.m2">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>

                          <XMDual>

                                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>

                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex21.m2.7.1"/>

                      </XMath>
                    </Math></td>
                </MathBranch>
              </MathFork>
            </equation>
          </equationgroup>
          <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="{\left|{{F}_{0}}\right|}" text="absolute-value@(F _ 0)" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m17">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p2.m17.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m17.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> cancels out. Similarly, for <Math mode="inline" tex="i=1,\dots,n" text="i = list@(1, dots, n)" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m18">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p2.m18.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p2.m18.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p2.m18.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m18.1">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m18.2">…</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m18.3">n</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, one
obtains</p>
          <equationgroup xml:id="S3.Ex23">
            <equation xml:id="S3.Ex23X">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle{N}_{z,i}(P_{i}-P_{i-1})\leq|{N}_{z,i}(P_{i}-v)|+|{N}_{z,i}(v-P_{%&#10;i-1})|" text="N _ (list@(z, i)) * (P _ i - P _ (i - 1)) less= absolute-value@(N _ (list@(z, i)) * (P _ i - v)) + absolute-value@(N _ (list@(z, i)) * (v - P _ (i - 1)))" xml:id="S3.Ex23X.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>

                <Math tex="\displaystyle\leq\frac{{C_{\text{Tr}}}}{\sqrt{(d-1)!}}{{\left\|{{\hat{\Psi}_{%&#10;\hat{z}}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{{K}_{d-1}}}}}}\left[\frac{h_{i}}{{\left|{{K}_{i}}%&#10;\right|}^{\frac{1}{2}}}e(v,{K}_{i})+\frac{h_{i-1}}{{\left|{{K}_{i-1}}\right|}^%&#10;{\frac{1}{2}}}e(v,{K}_{i-1})\right]." text="absent less= (C _ [Tr] / square-root@((d - 1)factorial)) * (norm@((hat@(Psi)) _ (hat@(z)))) _ (list@(0, 2, K _ (d - 1))) * delimited-[]@((h _ i / (absolute-value@(K _ i)) ^ (1 / 2)) * e * open-interval@(v, K _ i) + (h _ (i - 1) / (absolute-value@(K _ (i - 1))) ^ (1 / 2)) * e * open-interval@(v, K _ (i - 1)))" xml:id="S3.Ex23Xa.m1">

                </Math>
                <MathBranch>
                  <td/>
                  <td align="left"><Math tex="\displaystyle\leq\frac{{C_{\text{Tr}}}}{\sqrt{(d-1)!}}{{\left\|{{\hat{\Psi}_{%&#10;\hat{z}}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{{K}_{d-1}}}}}}\left[\frac{h_{i}}{{\left|{{K}_{i}}%&#10;\right|}^{\frac{1}{2}}}e(v,{K}_{i})+\frac{h_{i-1}}{{\left|{{K}_{i-1}}\right|}^%&#10;{\frac{1}{2}}}e(v,{K}_{i-1})\right]." text="absent less= (C _ [Tr] / square-root@((d - 1)factorial)) * (norm@((hat@(Psi)) _ (hat@(z)))) _ (list@(0, 2, K _ (d - 1))) * delimited-[]@((h _ i / (absolute-value@(K _ i)) ^ (1 / 2)) * e * open-interval@(v, K _ i) + (h _ (i - 1) / (absolute-value@(K _ (i - 1))) ^ (1 / 2)) * e * open-interval@(v, K _ (i - 1)))" xml:id="S3.Ex23Xa.m2">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex23Xa.m2.9"/>

            </equation>
          </equationgroup>
          <p>Using these bounds in the telescopic expansion (<ref labelref="LABEL:Telescopic"/>) gives</p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex24">
            <Math mode="display" tex="|P_{K}(z)-{N}_{z,{F}_{z}}(v)|\leq\frac{2{{C_{\text{Tr}}}}}{\sqrt{(d-1)!}}{{%&#10;\left\|{{\hat{\Psi}_{\hat{z}}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{{K}_{d-1}}}}}}\sum_{i=0}^{n}%&#10;\frac{h_{i}}{{\left|{{K}_{i}}\right|}^{\frac{1}{2}}}e(v,{K}_{i})." text="absolute-value@(P _ K * z - N _ (list@(z, F _ z)) * v) less= ((2 * C _ [Tr]) / square-root@((d - 1)factorial)) * (norm@((hat@(Psi)) _ (hat@(z)))) _ (list@(0, 2, K _ (d - 1))) * ((sum _ (i = 0)) ^ n)@((h _ i / (absolute-value@(K _ i)) ^ (1 / 2)) * e * open-interval@(v, K _ i))" xml:id="S3.Ex24.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex24.m1.11"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex24.m1.11">

                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>

                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex24.m1.11.3">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>In order to get independent of the specific choice of <Math mode="inline" tex="{F}_{z}" text="F _ z" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m19">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we
observe that the sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="({K}_{i})_{i=0}^{n}" text="(K _ i _ (i = 0)) ^ n" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m20">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p2.m20.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m20.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> does not allow a double
occurence of some element and that each element is a subset of
<Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{z}=\operatorname{supp}{\Phi}_{z}" text="omega _ z = supp@(Phi _ z)" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m21">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">supp</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. We therefore replace the preceding
inequality by</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:nbnval" xml:id="S3.E12">
            <tags>
              <tag>(3.12)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">3.12</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="|P_{K}(z)-{N}_{z,{F}_{z}}(v)|\leq\frac{2{{C_{\text{Tr}}}}}{\sqrt{(d-1)!}}{{%&#10;\left\|{{\hat{\Psi}_{\hat{z}}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{{K}_{d-1}}}}}}\sum_{{K}^{\prime%&#10;}\subset\omega_{z}}\frac{h_{{K}^{\prime}}}{{\left|{{K}^{\prime}}\right|}^{%&#10;\frac{1}{2}}}e(v,{K}^{\prime})," text="absolute-value@(P _ K * z - N _ (list@(z, F _ z)) * v) less= ((2 * C _ [Tr]) / square-root@((d - 1)factorial)) * (norm@((hat@(Psi)) _ (hat@(z)))) _ (list@(0, 2, K _ (d - 1))) * (sum _ (K ^ prime subset-of omega _ z))@((h _ (K ^ prime) / (absolute-value@(K ^ prime)) ^ (1 / 2)) * e * open-interval@(v, K ^ prime))" xml:id="S3.E12.m1">

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 1000 **** -->                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>where the sum is over all elements <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{M}}" text="K ^ prime element-of M" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m22">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with
<Math mode="inline" tex="{K}^{\prime}\subset\omega_{z}" text="K ^ prime subset-of omega _ z" xml:id="S3.SS3.p2.m23">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Inserting this inequality and
(<ref labelref="LABEL:LebnormBFct2"/>) into (<ref labelref="LABEL:CplngErr"/>), one arrives at</p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex25">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\left|{P_{K}-{\Pi}v}\right|_{K}}\leq 2\sqrt{d}{{C_{\text{Tr}}}}\sum_{z\in{L_{%&#10;{\ell}}}({K})\cap{\mathcal{C}}}\sum_{{K}^{\prime}\subset\omega_{z}}d_{\hat{z}}%&#10;\frac{h_{{K}^{\prime}}{{\left\|{{{\nabla}{\Phi}_{z}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{K}}}}}{%&#10;\left|{K}\right|}^{\frac{1}{2}}}{{{\left\|{{{\Phi}_{z}}}\right\|_{{0,2;{K}}}}}%&#10;{\left|{{K}^{\prime}}\right|}^{\frac{1}{2}}}e(v,{K}^{\prime})" text="(absolute-value@(P _ K - Pi * v)) _ K less= 2 * square-root@(d) * C _ [Tr] * (sum _ (z element-of L _ ell * K intersection C))@((sum _ (K ^ prime subset-of omega _ z))@(d _ (hat@(z)) * ((h _ (K ^ prime) * (norm@(nabla@(Phi _ z))) _ (list@(0, 2, K)) * (absolute-value@(K)) ^ (1 / 2)) / ((norm@(Phi _ z)) _ (list@(0, 2, K)) * (absolute-value@(K ^ prime)) ^ (1 / 2))) * e * open-interval@(v, K ^ prime)))" xml:id="S3.Ex25.m1">

                                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">∥</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>

                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>

          <p>Applying a Cauchy-Schwarz inequality, one obtains a sum of the squares
of the local best errors and the claimed inequality with</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:locDcplngConst" xml:id="S3.E13">
            <tags>
              <tag>(3.13)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">3.13</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\delta}_{K}^{2}=4d{{C_{\text{Tr}}}}\sum_{z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K})\cap{\mathcal{C%&#10;}}}d_{\hat{z}}^{2}\mu_{z}\frac{h_{K}^{2}{{\left\|{{{\nabla}{\Phi}_{z}}}\right%&#10;\|_{{0,{K};2}}}}^{2}}{{{\left\|{{{\Phi}_{z}}}\right\|_{{0,{K};2}}}}^{2}}" text="(delta _ K) ^ 2 = 4 * d * C _ [Tr] * (sum _ (z element-of L _ ell * K intersection C))@((d _ (hat@(z))) ^ 2 * mu _ z * (((h _ K) ^ 2 * ((norm@(nabla@(Phi _ z))) _ (list@(0, K, 2))) ^ 2) / ((norm@(Phi _ z)) _ (list@(0, K, 2))) ^ 2))" xml:id="S3.E13.m1">

          <p>and</p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex27">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\mu_{z}{:=}\frac{{\left|{K}\right|}}{h_{K}^{2}}\sum_{{K}^{\prime}\subset\omega%&#10;_{z}}\frac{h_{{K}^{\prime}}^{2}}{{\left|{{K}^{\prime}}\right|}}." text="mu _ z assign (absolute-value@(K) / (h _ K) ^ 2) * (sum _ (K ^ prime subset-of omega _ z))@((h _ (K ^ prime)) ^ 2 / absolute-value@(K ^ prime))" xml:id="S3.Ex27.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex27.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex27.m1.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>

                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>

                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex27.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex27.m1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex27.m1.2">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS3.p3">
        <p>Some remarks on the local decoupling constant <Math mode="inline" tex="{\delta}_{K}" text="delta _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m1">
            <XMath>

          </Math> depend on geometrical properties of the

        <p>To conclude this subsection, let us consider the case where the patch
<Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{K}" text="omega _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> consists of elements whose shape coefficients are
uniformly bounded by <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{K}" text="sigma _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>:</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:LocShapeReg" xml:id="S3.E14">
          <tags>
            <tag>(3.14)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">3.14</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\forall{K}^{\prime}\subset\omega_{K}\quad\frac{h_{{K}^{\prime}}}{\rho_{{K}^{%&#10;\prime}}}\leq\sigma_{K}." text="formulae@(for-all@(K ^ prime) subset-of omega _ K, h _ (K ^ prime) / rho _ (K ^ prime) less= sigma _ K)" xml:id="S3.E14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.E14.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S3.E14.m1.1">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.E14.m1.1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.E14.m1.1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.E14.m1.1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="for-all" name="forall" role="BIGOP">∀</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.E14.m1.1.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Then a standard scaling argument, see e.g. <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Brenner.Scott:08" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, (4.5.3)]</cite>
shows that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex29">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{h_{K}{{\left\|{{{\nabla}{\Phi}_{z}}}\right\|_{{0,{K};2}}}}}{{{\left\|{{{%&#10;\Phi}_{z}}}\right\|_{{0,{K};2}}}}}\leq\sigma_{K}\frac{{{\left\|{{{\nabla}\hat{%&#10;\Phi}_{\hat{z}}}}\right\|_{{0,{{{K}_{d}}};2}}}}}{{{\left\|{{\hat{\Phi}_{\hat{z%&#10;}}}}\right\|_{{0,{{{K}_{d}}};2}}}}}." text="(h _ K * (norm@(nabla@(Phi _ z))) _ (list@(0, K, 2))) / (norm@(Phi _ z)) _ (list@(0, K, 2)) less= sigma _ K * ((norm@(nabla@((hat@(Phi)) _ (hat@(z))))) _ (list@(0, K _ d, 2)) / (norm@((hat@(Phi)) _ (hat@(z)))) _ (list@(0, K _ d, 2)))" xml:id="S3.Ex29.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex29.m1.17"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex29.m1.17">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex29.m1.4"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">∥</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex29.m1.4">
                                <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                  <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>

                            <XMApp>

                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex29.m1.1"/>

                            </XMApp>

                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.Ex29.m1.13">0</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex29.m1.15">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Moreover, since the (solid) angles of the elements in <Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{K}" text="omega _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are bounded
away from 0 in terms of <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{K}" text="sigma _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the number of elements in each star of
<Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{K}" text="omega _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is bounded in terms of <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{K}" text="sigma _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Comparing elements having
common faces, we thus obtain that the diameters and the volumes of the elements
in a star of <Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{K}" text="omega _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are comparable up to <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{K}" text="sigma _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Consequently,
there holds <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu_{z}\leq C(\sigma_{K})" text="mu _ z less= C * sigma _ K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p3.m17.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m17.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for each <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K})" text="z element-of L _ ell * K" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS3.p3.m18.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS3.p3.m18.1">K</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
and the following lemma.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" xml:id="S3.Thmlem2">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma 3.2</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">3.2</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 3.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 3.2</text></tag> (<Math mode="inline" tex="{\delta}_{K}" text="delta _ K" xml:id="S3.Thmlem2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and shape regularity).</title>
        <para xml:id="S3.Thmlem2.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Under the assumption (<ref labelref="LABEL:LocShapeReg"/>) there holds</text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex30">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\delta}_{K}^{2}\leq 4d{{C_{\text{Tr}}}}C(\sigma_{K})\sum_{z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K%&#10;})\cap{\mathcal{C}}}{{\left\|{{\hat{\Psi}_{\hat{z}}}}\right\|_{{0,{{K}_{d-1}};%&#10;2}}}}^{2}{{\left\|{{{\nabla}\hat{\Phi}_{\hat{z}}}}\right\|_{{0,{{{K}_{d}}};2}}%&#10;}}^{2}." text="(delta _ K) ^ 2 less= 4 * d * C _ [Tr] * C * sigma _ K * (sum _ (z element-of L _ ell * K intersection C))@(((norm@((hat@(Psi)) _ (hat@(z)))) _ (list@(0, K _ (d - 1), 2))) ^ 2 * ((norm@(nabla@((hat@(Phi)) _ (hat@(z))))) _ (list@(0, K _ d, 2))) ^ 2)" xml:id="S3.Ex30.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex30.m1.8"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex30.m1.8">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                          <XMText><text font="italic" fontsize="70%">Tr</text></XMText>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex30.m1.8.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex30.m1.8.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>

                                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex30.m1.1"/>
                                    <XMWrap>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
        </para>
      </theorem>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" xml:id="S3.SS4">
      <tags>
        <tag>3.4</tag>
