      </tags>
      <title><tag close=". ">3.4</tag>Global decoupling and boundary conditions</title>
      <toctitle><tag close=" ">3.4</tag>Global decoupling and boundary conditions</toctitle>

      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="S3.SS4.p2">
          <p>We sum (<ref labelref="LABEL:LDcplng"/>) over all <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}" text="K element-of M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p2.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. On the right-hand side, we hit
a given element <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{M}}" text="K ^ prime element-of M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> at most <Math mode="inline" tex="1+n_{\ell}N_{\mathcal{M}}" text="1 + n _ ell * N _ M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> times, where
<Math mode="inline" tex="n_{\ell}=\#\{z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({K})\mid z\in\partial{K}\}" text="n _ ell = # * conditional-set@(z element-of L _ ell * K, z element-of partial-differential@(K))" xml:id="S3.SS4.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p2.m4.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p2.m4.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS4.p2.m4.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p2.m4.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p2.m4.1">K</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS4.p2.m4.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> indicates the
number of boundary Lagrange nodes and</p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex32">
            <Math mode="display" tex="N_{\mathcal{M}}{:=}\max_{z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({\mathcal{M}})}\#\{{K}^{\prime}\in{%&#10;\mathcal{M}}\mid{K}^{\prime}\ni z\}" text="N _ M assign (maximum _ (z element-of L _ ell * M))@(#) * conditional-set@(K ^ prime element-of M, K ^ prime contains z)" xml:id="S3.Ex32.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
<!--  %**** String Line 1125 **** -->                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid">max</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex32.m1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex32.m1.1">M</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex32.m1.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex32.m1.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex32.m1.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex32.m1.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="contains" name="ni" role="RELOP">∋</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>stands for the maximum number of elements in a star. The latter can be bounded
in terms of the shape coefficient of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}" text="M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p2.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, see the end
of §<ref labelref="LABEL:S:ldecoupling"/>, and the claim follows.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS4.p3">
        <p>Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:elm-dec"/> covers various boundary conditions associated with an
‘<Math mode="inline" tex="{H^{1}}" text="H ^ 1" xml:id="S3.SS4.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-setting’. We illustrate this by discussing Dirichlet
and Neumann boundary conditions for Poisson’s equation.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS4.p4">
        <p>For Dirichlet boundary conditions, we follow the approach of
L. R. Scott and S. Zhang in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Scott.Zhang:90" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, §5]</cite>. Denote by
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\Pi^{\text{SZ}}}:{H^{{1}}}(\Omega)\to{S}^{{\ell},0}({\mathcal{M}})" text="Pi ^ [SZ] colon H ^ 1 * Omega to S ^ (list@(ell, 0)) * M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                  <XMText><text fontsize="70%">SZ</text></XMText>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m1.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m1.3">Ω</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m1.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m1.2">0</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m1.4"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m1.4">M</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the interpolation
operator therein and recall that the restriction <Math mode="inline" tex="{\Pi^{\text{SZ}}}v_{|\partial\Omega}" text="Pi ^ [SZ] * v _ [|∂Ω]" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                  <XMText><text fontsize="70%">SZ</text></XMText>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  </XMArg>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
depends only on <Math mode="inline" tex="v_{|\partial\Omega}" text="v _ [|∂Ω]" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                </XMArg>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Given boundary values
<Math mode="inline" tex="g\in{H^{{\frac{1}{2}}}}(\partial\Omega)" text="g element-of H ^ (1 / 2) * partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="script" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m4.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the weak solution of a Dirichlet
problem is from the trial space</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex33">
          <Math mode="display" tex="X_{g}{:=}\{v\in{H^{1}}(\Omega)\mid v_{|\partial\Omega}=g\}" text="X _ g assign conditional-set@(v element-of H ^ 1 * Omega, v _ [|∂Ω] = g)" xml:id="S3.Ex33.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex33.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex33.m1.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex33.m1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex33.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex33.m1.1">Ω</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="mid" role="VERTBAR">∣</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex33.m1.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                        </XMArg>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and the finite element solution is sought in the space</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex34">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{S}_{g}({\mathcal{M}}){:=}\{V\in{S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}})\mid V\in C^{0}(%&#10;\overline{\Omega}),V_{|\partial\Omega}={\Pi^{\text{SZ}}}g\}\par\par" text="S _ g * M assign conditional-set@(V element-of S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * M, formulae@(V element-of C ^ 0 * overline@(Omega), V _ [|∂Ω] = Pi ^ [SZ] * g))" xml:id="S3.Ex34.m1">
            <XMath>

                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>

                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex34.m1.3"/>

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>which is not necessarily a subspace of <Math mode="inline" tex="X_{g}" text="X _ g" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. In view of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Sacchi.Veeser:06" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma
2.1]</cite>, (<ref labelref="LABEL:H1seminorm"/>) is a definite error notion on
<Math mode="inline" tex="X_{g}-{S}_{g}({\mathcal{M}})" text="X _ g - S _ g * M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m6.1">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since however <Math mode="inline" tex="{\Pi^{\text{SZ}}}v_{|\partial\Omega}=v_{|\partial\Omega}" text="Pi ^ [SZ] * v _ [|∂Ω] = v _ [|∂Ω]" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                    <XMText><text fontsize="70%">SZ</text></XMText>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    </XMArg>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  </XMArg>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in{S}^{{\ell},0}({\mathcal{M}})" text="v element-of S ^ (list@(ell, 0)) * M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m8.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m8.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m8.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m8.2">0</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m8.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m8.3">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, there holds
<Math mode="inline" tex="{S}_{g}({\mathcal{M}})\subset X_{g}" text="S _ g * M subset-of X _ g" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m9.1">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, i.e. the ensuing finite element method is
conforming, whenever possible. It is not difficult to show that the finite
element solution is a near best approximation from <Math mode="inline" tex="{S}_{g}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S _ g * M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p4.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p4.m10.1">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_cor" inlist="thm theorem:cor" labels="LABEL:C:Dirichlet" xml:id="S3.Thmcor1">
        <tags>
          <tag>Corollary 3.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">3.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 3.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 3.1</text></tag> (Dirichlet boundary values).</title>
        <para xml:id="S3.Thmcor1.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">For any <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in X_{g}" text="v element-of X _ g" xml:id="S3.Thmcor1.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, there holds</text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex35">
            <Math mode="display" tex="E\big{(}v,{S}_{g}({\mathcal{M}})\big{)}\leq C\left[\sum_{{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}}e%&#10;(v,{K})^{2}\right]^{\frac{1}{2}}," text="E * open-interval@(v, S _ g * M) less= C * (delimited-[]@((sum _ (K element-of M))@(e * (open-interval@(v, K)) ^ 2))) ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="S3.Ex35.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex35.m1.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex35.m1.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex35.m1.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex35.m1.5.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex35.m1.2">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex35.m1.5.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex35.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex35.m1.1">M</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex35.m1.5.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">[</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex35.m1.5.2">
                                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex35.m1.3"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex35.m1.4"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex35.m1.4">K</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">]</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="script" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 1175 **** -->                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p><text font="italic">where <Math mode="inline" tex="C" text="C" xml:id="S3.Thmcor1.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is the constant from Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:LDcplng"/>. Consequently, the
decoupling coefficient of <Math mode="inline" tex="{S}_{g}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S _ g * M" xml:id="S3.Thmcor1.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmcor1.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmcor1.p1.m3.1">M</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is bounded in terms of <Math mode="inline" tex="d" text="d" xml:id="S3.Thmcor1.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\ell}" text="ell" xml:id="S3.Thmcor1.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{\mathcal{M}}" text="sigma _ M" xml:id="S3.Thmcor1.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="S3.SS4.p5">
          <p>As for the case corresponding to the introduction, there holds</p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex36">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\mathcal{C}}={L_{{\ell}}}({\mathcal{M}})\cap{\Sigma}\quad\text{with}\quad{%&#10;\Sigma}=\bigcup_{{F}\in{\mathcal{F}_{d-1}}({\mathcal{M}})}{F}" text="formulae@(C = list@(L _ ell * M intersection Sigma, [with]), Sigma = (union _ (F element-of F _ (d - 1) * M))@(F))" xml:id="S3.Ex36.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex36.m1.4">

                              </XMApp>

                                <XMWrap>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex36.m1.1"/>

                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and we require that <Math mode="inline" tex="{F}_{z}\subset\partial\Omega" text="F _ z subset-of partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="S3.SS4.p5.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> whenever
<Math mode="inline" tex="z\in{\mathcal{C}}\cap\partial\Omega" text="z element-of C intersection partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="S3.SS4.p5.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Moreover, we require that the choices of
<Math mode="inline" tex="{F}_{z}" text="F _ z" xml:id="S3.SS4.p5.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in{L_{{\ell}}}({\mathcal{M}})\cap\partial\Omega" text="z element-of L _ ell * M intersection partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="S3.SS4.p5.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p5.m4.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p5.m4.1">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in definitions
of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\Pi^{\text{SZ}}}" text="Pi ^ [SZ]" xml:id="S3.SS4.p5.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                  <XMText><text fontsize="70%">SZ</text></XMText>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\Pi}" text="Pi" xml:id="S3.SS4.p5.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> coincide. Consequently,</p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex37">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\Pi}v_{|\partial\Omega}={\Pi^{\text{SZ}}}v_{|\partial\Omega}" text="Pi * v _ [|∂Ω] = Pi ^ [SZ] * v _ [|∂Ω]" xml:id="S3.Ex37.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMArg rule="Subscript">

                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                      </XMArg>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and (<ref labelref="LABEL:Ip;BdryVals"/>) holds with <Math mode="inline" tex="X=X_{g}" text="X = X _ g" xml:id="S3.SS4.p5.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and

              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p5.m8.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p5.m8.2">M</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:elm-dec"/> thus yields the
claim.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS4.p6">
        <p>For homogeneous Dirichlet boundary values <Math mode="inline" tex="g=0" text="g = 0" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:C:Dirichlet"/>
implies the non-obivous part of (<ref labelref="LABEL:equivalence"/>). A further immediate
consequence is that ‘near best in <Math mode="inline" tex="{S}_{g}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S _ g * M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p6.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m2.1">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>’ entails ‘near best in
<Math mode="inline" tex="{S}^{{\ell},0}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S ^ (list@(ell, 0)) * M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p6.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p6.m3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m3.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m3.2">0</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p6.m3.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m3.3">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>’. In particular, the aforementioned finite element
solution is thus near best in <Math mode="inline" tex="{S}^{{\ell},0}({\mathcal{M}})" text="S ^ (list@(ell, 0)) * M" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p6.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p6.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m4.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m4.2">0</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.SS4.p6.m4.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.SS4.p6.m4.3">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.SS4.p7">
        <p>For Neumann boundary conditions, the trial space is</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex38">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\tilde{X}{:=}{H^{1}}(\Omega)/{\mathbb{R}}," text="tilde@(X) assign (H ^ 1 * Omega) / R" xml:id="S3.Ex38.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex38.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex38.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex38.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex38.m1.1">Ω</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>which can be approximated by</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex39">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\tilde{S}({\mathcal{M}}){:=}{S}^{{\ell},0}({\mathcal{M}})/{\mathbb{R}}." text="tilde@(S) * M assign (S ^ (list@(ell, 0)) * M) / R" xml:id="S3.Ex39.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex39.m1.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex39.m1.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex39.m1.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex39.m1.3">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex39.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex39.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex39.m1.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.Ex39.m1.2">0</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex39.m1.4"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex39.m1.4">M</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Again, (<ref labelref="LABEL:H1seminorm"/>) is a definite error notion and the finite element
solution of this space is near best.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_cor" inlist="thm theorem:cor" labels="LABEL:C:Neumann" xml:id="S3.Thmcor2">
        <tags>
          <tag>Corollary 3.2</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">3.2</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 3.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 3.2</text></tag> (Neumann boundary values).</title>
        <para xml:id="S3.Thmcor2.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">For any <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\tilde{X}" text="v element-of tilde@(X)" xml:id="S3.Thmcor2.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, there holds
<!--  %**** String Line 1225 **** --></text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex40">
            <Math mode="display" tex="E\big{(}v,\tilde{S}({\mathcal{M}})\big{)}\leq C\left[\sum_{{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}%&#10;}e(v,{K})^{2}\right]^{\frac{1}{2}}," text="E * open-interval@(v, tilde@(S) * M) less= C * (delimited-[]@((sum _ (K element-of M))@(e * (open-interval@(v, K)) ^ 2))) ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="S3.Ex40.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex40.m1.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex40.m1.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex40.m1.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex40.m1.5.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex40.m1.2">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex40.m1.5.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex40.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex40.m1.1">M</XMTok>

                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex40.m1.5.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">[</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex40.m1.5.2">
                                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex40.m1.3"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex40.m1.4"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
