                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>with <Math mode="inline" tex="{{C_{\text{cmpl}}}}" text="C _ [cmpl]" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMText><text fontsize="70%">cmpl</text></XMText>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> depending only on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For any <Math mode="inline" tex="N\geq\#{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="N &gt;= # * M _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we
associate best errors with the two mesh families <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{M}}" text="M" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{M}}^{\prime}" text="M ^ prime" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Namely, the best approximation error</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex7">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sigma(v,N){:=}\min\big{\{}E\big{(}v,{S}({\mathcal{M}})\big{)}\mid{\mathcal{M}%&#10;}\in{\mathbb{M}},\ \#{\mathcal{M}}\leq N\big{\}}" text="sigma * open-interval@(v, N) assign minimum@(conditional@(E * open-interval@(v, S * M), M) element-of M, # * M less= N)" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.2">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.6"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.7"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.5">min</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="mid" role="MODIFIEROP">∣</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.4"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.6.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.4">v</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.6.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.3"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="5.0pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.7">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 1675 **** -->                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>with continuous piecewise polynomial functions over conforming meshes with less
than <Math mode="inline" tex="N" text="N" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>

          </Math> elements, which is greater than the corresponding best error</p>

        <p>with possibly discontinuous piecewise polynomial functions over possibly
non-conforming meshes. There also holds an inequality in the oppposite
direction, which may be seen as a generalization of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:elm-dec"/>.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:T:n-elm-dec" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3">
        <tags>
          <tag>Theorem 4.3</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.3</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 4.3</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 4.3</text></tag> (Non-conforming decoupling of elements).</title>
        <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Assume that the initial mesh <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is conforming, admissible, and that
all its stars are <Math mode="inline" tex="(d-1)" text="d - 1" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-face-connected. Then there exist constants <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{1}" text="C _ 1" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{2}" text="C _ 2" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> depending only on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>

              </Math> such that, for any <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in X" text="v element-of X" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m6">

              </Math> and

      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p5">
          <p>Set <Math mode="inline" tex="N^{\prime}{:=}\lfloor(N-N_{0})/{{C_{\text{cmpl}}}}\rfloor+N_{0}" text="N ^ prime assign floor@((N - N _ 0) / C _ [cmpl]) + N _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="floor"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok name="lfloor" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⌊</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m1.1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m1.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                            <XMText><text fontsize="70%">cmpl</text></XMText>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="rfloor" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⌋</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and choose an optimal
possibly non-conforming mesh <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}\in{\mathbb{M}}^{\prime}" text="M element-of M ^ prime" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="E\big{(}v,{S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}}^{\prime})\big{)}=\sigma^{\prime}(v,N^{%&#10;\prime})" text="E * open-interval@(v, S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * M ^ prime) = sigma ^ prime * open-interval@(v, N ^ prime)" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.5"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.3">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.5">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.1">ℓ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.2">
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.5.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.5.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.6"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.4">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.6">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Since
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is admissible, (<ref labelref="LABEL:complete"/>) yields <Math mode="inline" tex="\#{\mathcal{M}}\leq N" text="# * M less= N" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}{:=}\texttt{complete}({\mathcal{M}}^{\prime})" text="M assign [complete] * M ^ prime" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMText><text font="typewriter">complete</text></XMText>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m6.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Hence</p>
          <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx8">

                                    </XMWrap>

                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMath>
                    </Math></td>
                </MathBranch>
              </MathFork>
            </equation>
            <equation xml:id="S4.Ex10">
              <MathFork>

          <p>thanks to <Math mode="inline" tex="{S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}})\subset{S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}}^{\prime})" text="S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * M subset-of S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * M ^ prime" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m7">

                      <XMWrap>

The shape coefficient for any mesh in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{M}}" text="M" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is bounded in terms of the one
<!--  %**** String Line 1725 **** -->of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>; see, e.g., <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Nochetto.Siebert.Veeser:09" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 4.1]</cite>.
Moreover, any mesh in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{M}}" text="M" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> inherits from <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> that all its stars are
<Math mode="inline" tex="(d-1)" text="d - 1" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m12.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m12.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-face-connected. Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:elm-dec"/> therefore implies
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\delta}({\mathcal{M}})\leq{\delta}" text="delta * M less= delta" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m13.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m13.1">M</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, were <Math mode="inline" tex="{\delta}" text="delta" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m14">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> depends only on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m15">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. The
claimed inequality thus holds with <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{1}={\delta}" text="C _ 1 = delta" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m16">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{2}={{C_{\text{cmpl}}}}" text="C _ 2 = C _ [cmpl]" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m17">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMText><text fontsize="70%">cmpl</text></XMText>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p6">
        <p>The number of competing meshes for the best errors grows exponentially with
<Math mode="inline" tex="N-\#{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="N - # * M _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Nevertheless the following variant of adaptive tree
approximation by P. Binev and R. DeVore <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Binev.DeVore:04" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> constructs near
best meshes with <Math mode="inline" tex="O(N)" text="O * N" xml:id="S4.SS2.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">O</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p6.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p6.m2.1">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> operations and computations of the local error
functional</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex11">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\epsilon}({K}){:=}e(v,{K})^{2}," text="epsilon * K assign e * (open-interval@(v, K)) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex11.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex11.m1.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex11.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex11.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex11.m1.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex11.m1.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex11.m1.2">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex11.m1.3">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}" text="K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is any <Math mode="inline" tex="d" text="d" xml:id="S4.SS2.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-simplex and <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in{H^{1}}(\Omega)" text="v element-of H ^ 1 * Omega" xml:id="S4.SS2.p6.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p6.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p6.m5.1">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the target function.
Given a threshold <Math mode="inline" tex="t&gt;0" text="t &gt; 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p6.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we proceed as follows:</p>
      </para>
      <para class="ltx_noindent" xml:id="S4.SS2.p7">
        <itemize xml:id="S4.I1">
          <item xml:id="S4.I1.ix1">
            <para xml:id="S4.I1.ix1.p1">
              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{t}^{\prime}{:=}\emptyset" text="(M _ t) ^ prime assign empty-set" xml:id="S4.I1.ix1.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>;</p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item xml:id="S4.I1.ix2">
            <para xml:id="S4.I1.ix2.p1">
              <p><text font="typewriter">for all</text> <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="K element-of M _ 0" xml:id="S4.I1.ix2.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math></p>
              <itemize xml:id="S4.I1.I1">
                <item xml:id="S4.I1.ix2.ix1">
                  <para xml:id="S4.I1.ix2.ix1.p1">
                    <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\eta({K}){:=}{\epsilon}({K})" text="eta * K assign epsilon * K" xml:id="S4.I1.ix2.ix1.p1.m1">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.I1.ix2.ix1.p1.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I1.ix2.ix1.p1.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.I1.ix2.ix1.p1.m1.2"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I1.ix2.ix1.p1.m1.2">K</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math>;</p>
                  </para>
                </item>

                  <para xml:id="S4.I1.ix2.ix2.p1">

      </para>
      <para class="ltx_noindent" xml:id="S4.SS2.p8">
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="\texttt{grow}({K})" text="[grow] * K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> grows the subtree generating <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{t}^{\prime}" text="(M _ t) ^ prime" xml:id="S4.SS2.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
collects its leafs by</p>
      </para>

                    <itemize xml:id="S4.I2.I1.I1">

                  </para>
                </item>
                <item xml:id="S4.I2.ix6.ix5">
                  <para xml:id="S4.I2.ix6.ix5.p1">
                    <p><text font="typewriter">else</text></p>
                    <itemize xml:id="S4.I2.I1.I2">
                      <item xml:id="S4.I2.ix6.ix5.ix2">
                        <para xml:id="S4.I2.ix6.ix5.ix2.p1">
                          <p><Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{t}^{\prime}{:=}{\mathcal{M}}_{t}^{\prime}\cap\{{K}_{i}\}" text="(M _ t) ^ prime assign (M _ t) ^ prime intersection set@(K _ i)" xml:id="S4.I2.ix6.ix5.ix2.p1.m1">

                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>

                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix6.ix5.ix2.p1.m1.1">
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>

                                </XMApp>
                              </XMath>
                            </Math>;</p>
                        </para>
                      </item>
                    </itemize>
<!--  %**** String Line 1775 **** -->                  </para>
                </item>
              </itemize>
            </para>
          </item>
        </itemize>
      </para>
      <para class="ltx_noindent" xml:id="S4.SS2.p10">
        <p>and <Math mode="inline" tex="\texttt{bisect}({K})" text="[bisect] * K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMText><text font="typewriter">bisect</text></XMText>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p10.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p10.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implements the bisection of a single simplex;
see, e.g., <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Nochetto.Siebert.Veeser:09" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, §4.1]</cite>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p11">
        <p>The core of this algorithm is the thresholding algorithm in
<cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Birman.Solomyak:67" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> with the following important difference: the
local functional <Math mode="inline" tex="\eta({K})" text="eta * K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p11.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p11.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> depends not only on the local error functionals
but also on their history within in the subdivison hierarchy.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p12">
        <p>There are noteworthy variants of this algorithm. In particular, the threshold
<Math mode="inline" tex="t" text="t" xml:id="S4.SS2.p12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> can be avoided by successively bisecting the elements maximizing the
indicators <Math mode="inline" tex="\eta({K})" text="eta * K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p12.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p12.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p12.m2.1">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of the current mesh; see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Binev.DeVore:04" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. In
this case one may also ensure the conformity of the mesh at any intermediate
step. For these variants, the following theorem presents only non-essential
changes.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:T:tree-approx" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4">
        <tags>
          <tag>Theorem 4.4</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.4</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 4.4</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 4.4</text></tag> (Tree approximation).</title>
        <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Assume that the initial mesh <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is conforming, admissible, and that
all its stars are <Math mode="inline" tex="(d-1)" text="d - 1" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-face-connected. Then there exist constants <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{1}" text="C _ 1" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{2}" text="C _ 2" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> depending only on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> such that, for any <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in X" text="v element-of X" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and any
threshold <Math mode="inline" tex="t&gt;0" text="t &gt; 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, the output mesh <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}" text="M" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of the tree algorithm verifies
<!--  %**** String Line 1800 **** --></text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex12">
            <Math mode="display" tex="E\big{(}v,{S}({\mathcal{M}})\big{)}\leq C_{1}\sigma^{\prime}\left(v,\left%&#10;\lceil\frac{\#{\mathcal{M}}}{C_{2}}\right\rceil\right)" text="E * open-interval@(v, S * M) less= C _ 1 * sigma ^ prime * open-interval@(v, ceiling@((# * M) / C _ 2))" xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m1.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m1.5"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1.2">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1.5">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1.1">M</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m1.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m1.6"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1.4">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1.6">
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="ceiling"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m1.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok name="lceil" role="OPEN" stretchy="true">⌈</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex12.m1.3">
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="rceil" role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">⌉</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p><text font="italic">whenever <Math mode="inline" tex="\#{\mathcal{M}}\geq C_{2}(2\#{\mathcal{M}}_{0}+1)" text="# * M &gt;= C _ 2 * (2 * # * M _ 0 + 1)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m9.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m9.1">
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p13">
          <p>The local error functional <Math mode="inline" tex="{\epsilon}({K})=e(v,{K})^{2}=\inf_{P\in{\mathcal{P}_{{\ell}}({{K}})}}{\left|{v%&#10;-P}\right|_{K}}^{2}" text="epsilon * K = e * (open-interval@(v, K)) ^ 2 = (infimum _ (P element-of P _ ell * K))@(((absolute-value@(v - P)) _ K) ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m1.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m1.2">K</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m1.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m1.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m1.3">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m1.4">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">inf</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m1.5"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m1.5">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> obviously depends only on
the target function <Math mode="inline" tex="v" text="v" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and the simplex <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}" text="K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Moreover, it is subadditive:
if <Math mode="inline" tex="({K}_{1},{K}_{2})=\texttt{bisect}({K})" text="open-interval@(K _ 1, K _ 2) = [bisect] * K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m4.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m4.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m4.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m4.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMText><text font="typewriter">bisect</text></XMText>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m4.1">K</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="{\epsilon}({K}_{1})+{\epsilon}({K}_{2})\leq{\left|{v-P}\right|_{{{K}_{1}}}}^{2%&#10;}+{\left|{v-P}\right|_{{{K}_{2}}}}^{2}" text="epsilon * K _ 1 + epsilon * K _ 2 less= ((absolute-value@(v - P)) _ K _ 1) ^ 2 + ((absolute-value@(v - P)) _ K _ 2) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m5.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m5.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m5.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m5.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m5.3">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m5.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m5.4">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for any
<Math mode="inline" tex="P\in{\mathcal{P}_{{\ell}}({{K}})}" text="P element-of P _ ell * K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m6.1">K</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and thus</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex13">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\epsilon}({K}_{1})+{\epsilon}({K}_{2})\leq{\epsilon}({K})." text="epsilon * K _ 1 + epsilon * K _ 2 less= epsilon * K" xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.2.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.2.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.2.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Hence Theorem 4 of P. Binev’s contribution in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Oberwolfach4.3:07" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>
applies to the above for-loop that constructs <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{t}^{\prime}" text="(M _ t) ^ prime" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Writing</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex14">
            <Math mode="display" tex="N_{0}{:=}\#{\mathcal{M}}_{0},\quad N^{\prime}{:=}\#{\mathcal{M}}_{t}^{\prime},%&#10;\quad L^{\prime}{:=}N^{\prime}-N_{0}" text="formulae@(N _ 0 assign # * M _ 0, formulae@(N ^ prime assign # * (M _ t) ^ prime, L ^ prime assign N ^ prime - N _ 0))" xml:id="S4.Ex14.m1">

          </equation>
          <p>and observing <Math mode="inline" tex="E\big{(}v,{S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}})\big{)}^{2}=\sum_{{K}\in{\mathcal{M}}}%&#10;{\epsilon}({K})" text="E * (open-interval@(v, S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * M)) ^ 2 = (sum _ (K element-of M))@(epsilon * K)" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m8">

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>

                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>

                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

              </XMath>
            </Math> for any <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}^{\prime}\in{\mathbb{M}}^{\prime}" text="M ^ prime element-of M ^ prime" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we therefore have</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex15">
            <Math mode="display" tex="E\big{(}v,{S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}}_{t}^{\prime})\big{)}\leq\min_{0\leq l%&#10;\leq L^{\prime}}\left(1+\frac{l+\min\{l,N_{0}\}}{L^{\prime}+1-l}\right)\sigma^%&#10;{\prime}(v,N_{0}+l)." text="E * open-interval@(v, S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * (M _ t) ^ prime) less= (minimum _ (0 less= l less= L ^ prime))@(1 + (l + minimum@(l, N _ 0)) / ((L ^ prime + 1) - l)) * sigma ^ prime * open-interval@(v, N _ 0 + l)" xml:id="S4.Ex15.m1">

                          </XMApp>

                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                              <XMApp>

                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Under the assumption <Math mode="inline" tex="N^{\prime}\geq 2N_{0}" text="N ^ prime &gt;= 2 * N _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> this simplifies to</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex16">
            <Math mode="display" tex="E\big{(}v,{S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}}_{t}^{\prime})\big{)}\leq\min_{2N_{0}%&#10;\leq n\leq N^{\prime}}\frac{N^{\prime}+1}{N^{\prime}+1-n}\sigma^{\prime}(v,n)." text="E * open-interval@(v, S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * (M _ t) ^ prime) less= (minimum _ (2 * N _ 0 less= n less= N ^ prime))@(((N ^ prime + 1) / ((N ^ prime + 1) - n)) * sigma ^ prime) * open-interval@(v, n)" xml:id="S4.Ex16.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
