          <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is admissible, (<ref labelref="LABEL:complete"/>) ensures</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex17">
            <Math mode="display" tex="N-N_{0}\leq{{C_{\text{cmpl}}}}(N^{\prime}-N_{0})" text="N - N _ 0 less= C _ [cmpl] * (N ^ prime - N _ 0)" xml:id="S4.Ex17.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                      <XMText><text fontsize="70%">cmpl</text></XMText>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex17.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex17.m1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                          <XMApp>

                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>for <Math mode="inline" tex="N{:=}\#{\mathcal{M}}_{t}" text="N assign # * M _ t" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. In view of <Math mode="inline" tex="N\geq N^{\prime}\geq 2N_{0}" text="N &gt;= N ^ prime &gt;= 2 * N _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we may use the simpler
inequality <Math mode="inline" tex="N\leq\tilde{C}_{2}N^{\prime}" text="N less= (tilde@(C)) _ 2 * N ^ prime" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m14">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{C}_{2}=2{{C_{\text{cmpl}}}}" text="(tilde@(C)) _ 2 = 2 * C _ [cmpl]" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m15">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMText><text fontsize="70%">cmpl</text></XMText>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="x\mapsto x/(x-c)" text="x maps-to x / (x - c)" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m16">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 1850 **** -->                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m16.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m16.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is decreasing and <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m17">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> monotone, one thus can derive</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex18">
            <Math mode="display" tex="E\big{(}v,{S}^{{\ell},-1}({\mathcal{M}}_{t})\big{)}\leq\min_{2N_{0}\leq n\leq N%&#10;/\tilde{C}_{2}}\frac{N}{N-\tilde{C}_{2}n}\sigma^{\prime}(v,n)" text="E * open-interval@(v, S ^ (list@(ell, - 1)) * M _ t) less= (minimum _ (2 * N _ 0 less= n less= N / (tilde@(C)) _ 2))@((N / (N - (tilde@(C)) _ 2 * n)) * sigma ^ prime) * open-interval@(v, n)" xml:id="S4.Ex18.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex18.m1.6.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>

                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>whenever <Math mode="inline" tex="N\geq 2\tilde{C}_{2}N_{0}" text="N &gt;= 2 * (tilde@(C)) _ 2 * N _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m18">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Similarly as in the proof of Theorem
<ref labelref="LABEL:T:n-elm-dec"/>, Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:ErrEst"/> therefore implies</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex19">
            <Math mode="display" tex="E\big{(}v,{S}({\mathcal{M}}_{t})\big{)}\leq\delta\min_{2N_{0}\leq n\leq N/%&#10;\tilde{C}_{2}}\frac{N}{N-\tilde{C}_{2}n}\sigma^{\prime}(v,n)" text="E * open-interval@(v, S * M _ t) less= delta * (minimum _ (2 * N _ 0 less= n less= N / (tilde@(C)) _ 2))@((N / (N - (tilde@(C)) _ 2 * n)) * sigma ^ prime) * open-interval@(v, n)" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m1">

          </equation>
          <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta" text="delta" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m19">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> depends only on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{0}" text="M _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m20">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Choosing <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}" text="n element-of N" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m21">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="N/(2\tilde{C}_{2})-1&lt;n\leq N/(2\tilde{C}_{2})" text="N / (2 * (tilde@(C)) _ 2) - 1 less n less= N / (2 * (tilde@(C)) _ 2)" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m22">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m22.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m22.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>

                  </XMApp>

                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p13.m22.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m22.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, the claimed inequality
follows with <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{1}=2\delta" text="C _ 1 = 2 * delta" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m23">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{2}=2\tilde{C}_{2}" text="C _ 2 = 2 * (tilde@(C)) _ 2" xml:id="S4.SS2.p13.m24">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> as above.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p14">
        <p>Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:tree-approx"/> is of non-asymptotic nature; as can be seen from
the proof, the condition <Math mode="inline" tex="\#{\mathcal{M}}\geq C_{2}(2\#{\mathcal{M}}_{0}+1)" text="# * M &gt;= C _ 2 * (2 * # * M _ 0 + 1)" xml:id="S4.SS2.p14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p14.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p14.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">#</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> arising from
<Math mode="inline" tex="N^{\prime}\geq 2N_{0}" text="N ^ prime &gt;= 2 * N _ 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p14.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is of simplifying nature. In particular, it does not suppose any
regularity beyond <Math mode="inline" tex="{H^{1}}(\Omega)" text="H ^ 1 * Omega" xml:id="S4.SS2.p14.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p14.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p14.m3.1">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of the target function.</p>
      </para>
<!--  %**** String Line 1875 **** -->      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p15">
        <p>In <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Binev.DeVore:04" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, §7]</cite> a similar algorithm is proposed. It relies on
the local error functionals</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex20">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\tilde{\epsilon}({K}){:=}\inf\big{\{}{\left|{v-V}\right|_{{\omega_{K}}}}\mid V%&#10;\in{S}({\mathcal{M}}_{K})\big{\}}" xml:id="S4.Ex20.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">inf</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{M}}_{K}" text="M _ K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p15.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the set of elements of the so-called minimal ring
<Math mode="inline" tex="R^{-}({K})" text="R ^ - * K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p15.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p15.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p15.m2.1">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> around <Math mode="inline" tex="{K}" text="K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p15.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> given by</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex21">
          <Math mode="display" tex="R^{-}({K}){:=}\bigcap_{{\mathcal{M}}\in{\mathbb{M}}:{\mathcal{M}}\ni{K}}R({K},%&#10;{\mathcal{M}})\quad\text{with}\quad R({K},{\mathcal{M}}){:=}\bigcup_{{K}^{%&#10;\prime}\in{\mathcal{M}}:{K}^{\prime}\cap{K}\neq\emptyset}{K}^{\prime}." text="formulae@(R ^ - * K assign list@((intersection _ (M element-of M colon M contains K))@(R * open-interval@(K, M)), [with]), R * open-interval@(K, M) assign (union _ (K ^ prime element-of M colon K ^ prime intersection K not-equals empty-set))@(K ^ prime))" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.7"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.7">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.7.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.7.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.7.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.1">K</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.7.1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.6"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.7.1.1">
                              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                                <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="display" meaning="intersection" name="bigcap" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">⋂</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="contains" name="ni" role="RELOP">∋</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.2"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.3"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.2">K</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.3">M</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                            <XMText xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.6">with</XMText>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.7.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.4"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m1.5"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.4">K</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1.5">M</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="display" meaning="union" name="bigcup" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">⋃</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>In view of the minimality of the ring, these error functionals do not depend on
the surrounding mesh. They are not subadditive, but weakly subadditive with
respect to repeated bisections and so another variant of the tree algorithm
with a similar statement to Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:tree-approx"/> still applies. The
local error functionals <Math mode="inline" tex="e({K})" text="e * K" xml:id="S4.SS2.p15.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p15.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p15.m4.1">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are however simpler to implement and can be
<!--  %**** String Line 1900 **** -->combined with single bisection. Thus, the use of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:elm-dec"/> here
permits an algorithmic simplification.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection xml:id="S4.SSx1">
      <title>Acknowledgments</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.SSx1.p1">
        <p>The author wants to thank Francesco Mora for useful discussions regarding
Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:T:elm-dec"/>.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
  </section>
